info.name: IS_SCHEME_NAME_START_WITH_COUNTRY_CODE
info.description: The Name values of SchemeName MUST respect the following structure CC:name_value where CC is the country code.

info.name: IS_DISTRIBUTION_POINTS_SECURED_TL
info.description: The TL MUST be published "in a secure manner".

info.name: IS_X509CERTIFICATE_CONTAINS_TSLSIGNING_EXT_KEY_USAGE
info.description: ExtendedKeyUsage extension should be present containing id-tsl-kp-tslSigning.
